con:testStep.name: READ_ME
con:testStep.con:description:
HERE THE CUSTOMER IS A VIP AND HAS ACCOUNTS BANK EMPLOYEE WITH PROPER ROLE SHOULD BE ABLE TO READ / SEARCH PAYMENTS ON ACCOUNT THAT HAS BEEN CREATED BY VIP CUSTOMER.
Ex: "CUSTOMER123" IS A VIP CUSTOMER (VIP-9) OF BANK 4201 HAVING ACCOUNTS "ACCOUNT123" AND "ACCOUNT456" "CUSTOMER987" IS A GENERAL CUSTOMER OF 4201 HAVING ACCOUNT "ACCOUNT987" AND ALSO HAS ACCESS TO "ACCOUNT123"
BANK EMPLOYEE WITH ANY VIP ROLE MUST BE ABLE TO READ PAYMENTS CREATED ON "ACCOUNT987" WHEN PAYMENT IS CREATED BY "CUSTOMER987" (NON-VIP) BANK EMPLOYEE WITH ANY VIP ROLE CAN ALSO SEE PAYMENTS ON "ACCOUNT123" WHEN PAYMENT IS CREATED BY "CUSTOMER987" (NON-VIP)
BANK EMPLOYEE WITH VIP ROLE = 9 CAN SEE PAYMENTS CREATED ON ACCOUNT "ACCOUNT123" WHEN PAYMENT IS CREATED BY "CUSTOMER123" (VIP) OR "CUSTOMER987" (NON-VIP) BANK EMPLOYEE WITH VIP ROLE = 9 CAN SEE PAYMENTS CREATED ON ACCOUNT "ACCOUNT456" WHEN PAYMENT IS CREATED BY "CUSTOMER123" (VIP)
BANK EMPLOYEE WITH NO VIP ROLES AND NO EAM PERMISSIONS CANNOT MAKE ANY OPERATIONS ON A PAYMENT AND GET "User not authorized to perform requested operation" BANK EMPLOYEE WITH NO VIP ROLES AND HAS EAM PERMISSIONS CANNOT SEARCH / READ VIP PAYMENTS AND GET "No data found"
